name: 10 Seconds (itch) (Constanze)
description:
Controls: A, D, Space, E (to use the terminal)

Every 10 seconds you end up in a different place. There is a mysterious door located behind the laser in one of the locations, a terminal is standing right next to it, where you can enter 4 numbers. You should find the combination somehow and escape this weird situation.

Made by: Connor, Constanze, Kaolee
